verses.verse: The vision<WH2377> of Obadiah.<WH5662> This is what the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH3069> says<WH559> about Edom.<WH123> We have heard<WH8085> news<WH8052> from Yahweh,<WH3068> and an ambassador<WH6735> is sent<WH7971> among the nations,<WH1471> saying,<WH6965> "Arise, and let<WH6965>'s rise up against her in battle.<WH4421>
Behold,<WH5414> I have made you small<WH6996> among the nations.<WH1471> You are greatly<WH3966> despised.<WH959>

The pride<WH2087> of your heart<WH3820> has deceived<WH5377> you,<WH7931> you who dwell in the clefts<WH2288> of the rock,<WH5553> whose habitation<WH3427> is high,<WH4791> who says<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> <WH3381> 'Who will bring me down to the ground?<WH776>'
Though you mount on high<WH1361> as the eagle,<WH5404> and though your nest<WH7064> is set<WH7760> among the stars,<WH3556> I will bring you down<WH3381> from there,<WH5002>" says Yahweh.<WH3068>

"If thieves<WH1590> came<WH935> to you,<WH7703> if robbers by night<WH3915>— oh,<WH1820> what disaster awaits you<WH1589>— wouldn't they only steal until they had enough?<WH1767> If grape pickers<WH1219> came<WH935> to you,<WH7604> wouldn't they leave some gleaning grapes?<WH5955>
How Esau<WH6215> will be ransacked!<WH2664> How his hidden<WH4710> treasures are sought out!<WH2664>

All the men<WH582> of your alliance<WH1285> have brought<WH7971> you on your way,<WH1366> even to the border. The men<WH582> who were at peace<WH7965> with you have deceived<WH5377> you,<WH3201> and prevailed against you.<WH3899> Friends who eat your bread lay<WH7760> a snare<WH4204> under you.<WH8394> There is no understanding in him."
"Won't<WH3117> I in that day," says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "destroy<WH6> the wise<WH2450> men out of Edom,<WH123> and understanding<WH8394> out of the mountain<WH2022> of Esau?<WH6215>
Your mighty<WH1368> men,<WH8487> Teman, will be dismayed,<WH2865> to the end that everyone<WH376> may be cut off<WH3772> from the mountain<WH2022> of Esau<WH6215> by slaughter.<WH6993>
For the violence<WH2555> done to your brother<WH251> Jacob,<WH3290> shame<WH955> will cover<WH3680> you,<WH3772> and you will be cut off forever.<WH5769>

In the day<WH3117> that you stood<WH5975> on the other side,<WH3117> in the day that strangers<WH2114> carried<WH7617> away his substance,<WH2428> and foreigners<WH5237> entered<WH935> into his gates,<WH8179> and cast<WH3032> lots<WH1486> for Jerusalem,<WH3389> even you were like one of them.<WH259>

But don't<WH7200> look down on your brother<WH251> in the day<WH3117> of his disaster,<WH5235> and don't<WH8055> rejoice over the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> in the day<WH3117> of their destruction.<WH6> Don't<WH6310> speak proudly<WH1431> in the day<WH3117> of distress.<WH6869>

Don't<WH935> enter into the gate<WH8179> of my people<WH5971> in the day<WH3117> of their calamity.<WH343> Don't<WH7200> look down on their affliction<WH7451> in the day<WH3117> of their calamity,<WH343> neither seize<WH7971> their wealth<WH2428> on the day<WH3117> of their calamity.<WH343>
Don't<WH5975> stand in the crossroads<WH6563> to cut off<WH3772> those of his who escape.<WH6412> Don't<WH5462> deliver up those of his who remain<WH8300> in the day<WH3117> of distress.<WH6869>

For the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> is near<WH7138> all the nations!<WH1471> As you have done,<WH6213> it will be done<WH6213> to you.<WH1576> Your deeds will return<WH7725> upon your own head.<WH7218>

For as you have drunk<WH8354> on my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022> so will all the nations<WH1471> drink<WH8354> continually.<WH8548> Yes,<WH8354> they will drink, swallow down,<WH3886> and will be as though they had not been.<WH3808>
But in Mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> there will be those who escape,<WH6413> and it will be holy.<WH6944> The house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290> will possess<WH3423> their possessions.<WH4180>

The house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290> will be a fire,<WH784> the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130> a flame,<WH3852> and the house<WH1004> of Esau<WH6215> for stubble.<WH7179> They will burn<WH1814> among them,<WH398> and devour them.<WH8300> There will not be any remaining to the house<WH1004> of Esau.<WH6215>" Indeed,<WH3068> Yahweh has spoken.<WH1696>

Those of the South<WH5045> will possess<WH3423> the mountain<WH2022> of Esau,<WH6215> and those of the lowland,<WH8219> the Philistines.<WH6430> They will possess<WH3423> the field<WH7704> of Ephraim,<WH669> and the field<WH7704> of Samaria.<WH8111> Benjamin<WH1144> will possess Gilead.<WH1568>

The captives<WH1546> of this army<WH2426> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> who are among the Canaanites,<WH3669> will possess even to Zarephath;<WH6886> and the captives<WH1546> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> who are in Sepharad,<WH5614> will possess<WH3423> the cities<WH5892> of the Negev.<WH5045>
Saviors<WH3467> will go up<WH5927> on Mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> to judge<WH8199> the mountains<WH2022> of Esau,<WH6215> and the kingdom<WH4410> will be Yahweh<WH3068>'s.
